item.title: Experienced FPV Drone Pilot needed for Track & Field Coaching Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview
I am seeking a skilled and versatile FPV drone pilot to create high-quality video content focused on athletic coaching. This content will specifically cover how to sprint and apply sprint techniques to sports. The footage will be used for social media and instructional videos on my website.

Role Responsibilities
Videography: Capture high-quality video content using a FPV drone, focusing on athletic drills and techniques. This includes framing, composition, and ensuring smooth motion shots to best capture the dynamic nature of sprinting.

Collaboration: Work closely with me to understand the vision and specific requirements for each shoot, particularly in capturing the nuances of sprinting techniques.

Qualifications
Proficiency with FPV Drones: Experienced in shooting video content with FPV drones, including familiarity with their camera settings and capabilities.

Creativity and Technical Skills: Ability to create visually engaging content that effectively conveys athletic coaching techniques.

Project Details
Focus: Recording and showcasing sprint techniques and their application in sports.

Location:
Marsteller Middle School Track
14000 Sudley Manor Dr, Bristow, VA 20136

Duration: 3 hours per shoot.

Hourly Range: $75.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:03 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Drone Videography, Videography
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Drone Videography, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor(stock footage) - Upwork
item.description:
Salary: $300 per month (for 10 videos), paid per video

Are you passionate about cars and skilled in video editing? We're looking for a talented video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you'll play a crucial role in creating engaging and high-quality content for our audience of car enthusiasts.

Responsibilities:

Edit 10 videos per month for our car review channel.
Ensure each video meets our quality standards and brand guidelines.
Collaborate with the content team to create compelling narratives and visual storytelling.
Deliver edited videos on time and within budget.
Requirements:

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.
Strong understanding of cinematic techniques, pacing, and storytelling.
Attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in style and tone across videos.
Excellent communication skills and ability to take feedback.
Previous experience with car-related content is a plus but not required.
Application Process:
To apply for this position, please include the following:

Your resume and portfolio showcasing your previous video editing work.
A 30-second sample video demonstrating your editing skills. i will providing you with the script and voice over to get started and also some example videos of the editng style i am looking for. This video should be related to cars and showcase your ability to create engaging content.
Include the phrase "Vroom Vroom" somewhere in your application to indicate that you've read the entire job post.
Payment Details:
Each edited video will be compensated at a rate of $30 per video, with a total monthly payment of $300 for completing 10 videos. Payment will be made upon satisfactory completion and approval of each video.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Color Grading, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Music Video, Color Grading, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Cayman Islands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Lecture Series - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to edit a lecture series, one video at a time. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing, sound design, color grading, and exporting videos for YouTube. Attention to detail and the ability to maintain the integrity of the content is crucial. The editor should be able to work closely with our team to understand our requirements and deliver high-quality edited videos. Strong communication skills and the ability to meet deadlines are a must.

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Sound design
- Color grading
- Working with RAW or ProRes formats
- Exporting to various formats (MOV, YouTube, Twitter, etc)
- Working with proxy files

In your application please answer with 1) similar work you've done before, 2) what excites you about this work, 3) what editing softwares you can use and what you prefer to use, and 4) how long you have been editing videos for.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Education, Audio Editing, Sound Mixing
Skills: Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Education, Audio Editing, Sound Mixing
Country: United States

item.title: Cinematic Real Estate Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a real estate marketing firm in the United States, shooting about 50-75 videos each month.  We are seeking a talented cinematic video editor for long term outsourcing, delivering 1-2 videos per day (M-F).

Final videos are typically 90-180 sec
We provide the best footage for you to select from.
We provide a library of licensed audio for use. 
Clips include aerials, slider reveals, rack focus, etc.
Speed-ramps and timely cuts and transitions are used to make the video dance to the music.
The music you select should match the style of the home.  
Each video is delivered in non-branded and branded versions. 

Doing so many of the same kinds of videos, you'll quickly get into a balanced groove of creativity and efficiency.  

The average video takes about 2 hours from start to finish.

We need next day delivery.  If we provide video clips to you on Monday night (Pacific Time), we need the complete video by 4:00pm the next day (Pacific Time).  

If this looks like an ideal gig for you, please follow the steps below to apply.  

Step 1:  Review our 4 sample videos to get a feel for the quality and skills required.  https://vimeo.com/revideo

Step 2:  We'd like you to create a video for us using sample footage at https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vnBusd8GlqbsE7T40H3SalLa30pmeJOw?usp=sharing.

Step 3:  Review the footage linked above, and tell us how much you will charge to create a video sample for us. Also include a cover letter with information about yourself and your experience.

Thank you.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Fitness model, photographs and videos 14 day challenge - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a female fitness professional who also has the ability to shoot photographs on a white back ground as well as film videos showing how to do exercises.

The videos need to be shot professionally but also have some filmed organically and not on a white background.

There will be more jobs if this job is good

The job will entail:
Creating content for a 14 day squat challenge
Shooting stills (on a white back ground) of each of the exercises as per the brief - must be high res and for use in PDF's so must be high quality
Shooting 6 videos to accompany the 14 day challenge (please see what is required for the videos)
1 x video on welcome to the 14 day challenge - let's talk about why the squats are good for your body and information about how to get the most out of the challenge
1 x video on how to do a squat - correct form, amendments to make for beginner versus advance and when not to do these exercises (injuries, bad knees etc)
1 x video on day 1 showing the exercises
1 x video on day 5 showing the exercises
1 x video on day 10 showing the exercises
1 x video on day 14 showing the exercises
Total videos (can be filmed organically vertically) 6

Must be good light, useful, informative and clear talking. Each video to be to the point and have different outfits on for maximum engagement. The videos are for use on social media

Also open to other feedback/suggestions

If this is good we can do a lot more as I will have a lot more work.


The target demographic is women aged over 30
Thank you

Budget: $199
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:38 UTC
Category: Local Photography
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Photo Editing, Videography, Photography, Sports & Fitness, Health & Fitness, Physical Fitness
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Photo Editing, Videography, Photography, Sports & Fitness, Health & Fitness, Physical Fitness
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: 30 Second Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! Here's an example of the type of videos I'm looking for. High energy with quick transitions and various video effects.

https://www.instagram.com/p/C4qY1Y2tFng/

I will be attending and capturing content at these running related events myself and will work to immediately send the video files to you following each event (typically a weekday evening here in the US). In total, there will be 10-11 of these 30 second video edits needed over the course of two months.

Two questions as I work to find the best fit for these edits:

-Do you have any experience editing running or fitness-related videos? If so, can you please share examples?
-How quickly do you estimate you could turn around a video edit if I provided all files immediately following an event?

Thank you!
Chase


Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Join Our Team as a Creative Video Editor for a Marketing Podcast - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a visionary video editor who thrives on creativity and innovation? Our leading marketing podcast is looking for someone with technical skills, sharp ideas, and creative solutions. Your role will be crucial in not just showcasing our content, but enhancing it with your unique perspective.

Your Mission:
- Edit Full-Length Podcast Episodes: Use your creative genius to bring our podcasts to life.
- Craft Promotional Shorts: Develop compelling promotional clips that align with our strategy to go viral and captivate our audience.

We seek someone who is passionate about infusing creativity into every project, viewing each episode as an opportunity to inspire with something unexpected.


Key Responsibilities:
- Produce Engaging Videos: Create full-length podcast videos and promotional clips that blend technical excellence with creative flair.
- Innovative Editing Techniques: Utilize advanced editing techniques, graphic elements, and animations to tell our story in the most engaging way.
- Collaborate with the Team: Work closely with our production team to brainstorm and implement creative concepts for each episode.
- Deliver High-Quality Content: Ensure all content reflects our brand and meets deadlines with exceptional quality.
- Open Communication: Engage actively with the team, offering fresh ideas and embracing feedback to refine your work.


Who You Are:
- Skilled Video Editor: You have a portfolio that showcases both your technical ability and creative vision.
- Tech-Savvy: Proficient in leading video editing software and eager to embrace cutting-edge industry trends.
- Aesthetic Eye: You have a keen eye for modern aesthetics and the skill to maintain professional video standards.
- Efficient and Quality-Focused: Quick and agile in your work, with an unwavering commitment to stellar quality content.
- Great Collaborator: Excellent communication skills and a passion for sharing your ideas and solutions.


What We Offer
- Test Project: An opportunity to highlight your creativity and alignment with our brand’s vision.
- Creative Partnership: The potential for a lasting creative partnership, where your innovative ideas are valued and rewarded.
- Collaborative Atmosphere: A work environment where creative thinking and novel solutions are the currency of success.


How to Apply
Your creativity is what we need to take our visual storytelling to the next level. To apply, please:

- Share Your Portfolio: Include examples of podcast or long-format video projects you've elevated with your creative touch.
- Describe Your Approach: Outline your editing and problem-solving approach, and provide your rate structure.

We offer fair compensation for a test project to confirm your inventive work and expertise.

Join us and be part of a team where your creativity can shine and make a real impact!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$16.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Production, Audio Post Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Production, Audio Post Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor with Copyright Expertise - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

Looking for a video editor with an eye for detail and a deep understanding of copyright laws. Needs to have a talent for creating  engaging content that keeps audiences engaged. If you have a passion for film and a proven track record in audience retention,  this could turn into a longterm position.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit and produce high-quality video content that resonates with our target audience.
Ensure all content complies with copyright laws and industry regulations.
Utilize your expertise in audience retention to create compelling narratives and visual stories.
Collaborate with our creative team to bring innovative ideas to life.
Stay updated on the latest trends and techniques in video editing and film.

Qualifications:
Portfolio of completed projects.
In-depth knowledge of copyright laws and fair use principles.
Strong understanding of audience retention strategies and techniques.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).

Would be nice
Excellent storytelling skills and a passion for Film/TV


Budget: $65
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: USA
click to apply
